thread.title: Royals schedule Take the Crown rally for Friday morning
thread.title_full: Royals schedule Take the Crown rally for Friday morning - KCTV5

author: DeAnn Smith, Digital Content Manager
title: Royals schedule Take the Crown rally for Friday morning
text:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) - The Kansas City Royals are hosting a Take the Crown rally Friday morning at the Country Club Plaza.
Fans are encouraged to show their playoff pride as the Royals begin their ALCS against the Toronto Blue Jays on Friday night at Kauffman Stadium.
The event will start at 7 a.m. and last until 9 a.m. at the iconic J.C. Nichols Fountains.
Members of the K Crew and Sluggerrr will attend along with face painters, stilt walkers, balloon artists and live music.
Officials with the city and Jackson County are also expected to participate.
Tell us how you are showing your Royals pride. Click here to go to our Facebook page.
